dcterms:creator: K. Drossos
S. Lipping
T. Virtanen
dcterms:description: Clotho is a classical audio captioning dataset that contains audio clips from the Freesound archive, with each clip having five captions annotated by different Amazon Mechanical Turk workers. The clips range from 15 to 30 seconds in duration, and the captions contain 8 to 20 words. The dataset used in the experiments is Clotho v2, which includes 3839 development, 1045 validation, and 1045 evaluation splits.
dcterms:title: Clotho

dcterms:creator: C. D. Kim
B. Kim
H. Lee
G. Kim
dcterms:description: AudioCaps is the largest audio captioning dataset, consisting of 50k audio clips, each with a duration of 10 seconds. The dataset is divided into three parts: 49274 audio clips for training, 497 for validation, and 957 for testing. Each audio clip has one caption in the training dataset and five captions in the validation and test datasets.
dcterms:title: AudioCaps
